properties.title: Babcock State Park
properties.description: Scenic backup MTB — ~5-10 mi on old roads and railroad grades. 30-35 min from Fayetteville. Call (304) 438-3004 for winter road access. [UNVERIFIED]

properties.title: Babcock State Park Entrance Parking
properties.description: 486 Babcock Rd, Clifftop, WV 25831. Interior park roads may be gated in winter — call ahead. [UNVERIFIED]

properties.title: Glade Creek Grist Mill
properties.description: Iconic WV landmark — scenic stop if visiting Babcock. ~1 min walk from parking. [UNVERIFIED]
